article_title: New York City Website Lets Users Drill Deep Into Census Data
article_text:
At New York’s Department of City Planning, staff members are bombarded with requests for information about neighborhoods.

“How do you choose when you get a deluge of requests?” said Joseph Salvo, director of the department’s population division. “The demand just keeps coming up. If we don’t do this, we’re going to be buried.”

“This” is a significantly revamped version of a website with a large volume of neighborhood-level...

twitter.description: New York’s Department of City Planning has released a significantly revamped version of a website, dubbed Census FactFinder, with a large volume of neighborhood-level census data.
twitter.title: New York City Website Lets Users Drill Deep Into Census Data
